body:
**Actionable comments posted: 7** > [!CAUTION] > Some comments are outside the diff and can‚Äôt be posted inline due to platform limitations. > > > >
> ‚ö†Ô∏è Outside diff range comments (1)
> >
> .claude/skills/implement_task/SKILL.md (1)
> > `89-95`: **Script path `scripts/mcp/morph_apply.py` does not exist and must be corrected or created.** > > The documentation at lines 89-95 references a non-existent script. Neither the file nor the `scripts/mcp/` directory exist in the repository. Users or agents following this command will encounter a failure. Either the script must be created at this location, or the documentation must reference the correct path to the actual script location. > >
> >
ü§ñ Fix all issues with AI agents ``` In @.claude/skills/firecrawl-scrape/SKILL.md: - Around line 18-21: The documented run command references "scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py" but the actual script lives at "opc/scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py"; either update every occurrence of "scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py" (including the command invocation shown as python -m runtime.harness scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py and the other mentions on the doc lines called out) to "opc/scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py", or add a brief note above the examples stating "run these commands from the opc/ directory" and keep the relative paths‚Äîpick one approach and apply it consistently to the occurrences around the shown command and the other referenced blocks. In @.claude/skills/github-search/SKILL.md: - Line 18: Update the three command examples that reference the literal string "uv run python -m runtime.harness scripts/mcp/github_search.py \" so they point to the actual script location by prepending the opc/ directory (i.e., replace "scripts/mcp/github_search.py" with "opc/scripts/mcp/github_search.py" in each occurrence in the SKILL.md example commands). In @.claude/skills/morph-apply/SKILL.md: - Line 37: Three command examples reference the wrong script path; replace every occurrence of the incorrect string "scripts/mcp/morph_apply.py" in SKILL.md with the correct path "opc/scripts/mcp/morph_apply.py" so all three uv run python -m runtime.harness ... morph_apply.py examples point to the actual script location. In @.claude/skills/morph-search/SKILL.md: - Around line 21-23: Replace every occurrence of the command path "scripts/mcp/morph_search.py" in the SKILL.md command examples with "opc/scripts/mcp/morph_search.py"; update all five examples that reference that script so the commands use the correct path and will execute successfully. In @.claude/skills/recall-reasoning/SKILL.md: - Line 27: Update all occurrences that call artifact_query.py and artifact_index.py to use the project-root .claude script path variable instead of the root scripts path; specifically replace invocations like python scripts/core/artifact_query.py "" ... with python "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/scripts/core/artifact_query.py" "" ... for the four artifact_query.py references and replace python scripts/core/artifact_index.py ... with python "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/scripts/core/artifact_index.py" ... (these edits affect the artifact_query.py calls at the four listed locations and the artifact_index.py call noted in the comment). In @.claude/skills/recall/SKILL.md: - Line 30: Update the documentation references that still point to the old script path by replacing all occurrences of "scripts/recall_learnings.py" with the new path "scripts/core/recall_learnings.py" in the listed docs (docs/tools/memory.md and docs/tools/README.md), ensuring every instance at the referenced lines (and any other occurrences) is updated so commands like the cd/uv run invocation use the updated script location. In @.claude/skills/remember/SKILL.md: - Line 47: Update the stale script path references: in docs/tools/memory.md (5 occurrences) and docs/tools/README.md (1 occurrence) replace any instance of "scripts/store_learning.py" with "scripts/core/store_learning.py"; verify each replacement preserves surrounding command examples (e.g., the full command starting with cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/opc && PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ...) and run a quick grep to ensure no remaining occurrences of the old path remain before committing. ```
üìú Review details **Configuration used**: Organization UI **Review profile**: ASSERTIVE **Plan**: Pro **Knowledge base: Disabled due to `Reviews -> Disable Knowledge Base` setting**
üì• Commits Reviewing files that changed from the base of the PR and between 49cef1012da794a7563d16ded83a1e6ef8d59693 and e13603363d21d19d9b9131b7a894fba8436ed71b.
üìí Files selected for processing (14) * `.claude/skills/firecrawl-scrape/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/github-search/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/help/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/implement_task/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/morph-apply/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/morph-search/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/nia-docs/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/perplexity-search/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/recall-reasoning/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/recall/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/remember/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/research-agent/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/research-external/SKILL.md` * `.claude/skills/system_overview/SKILL.md`
üß∞ Additional context used
ü™õ markdownlint-cli2 (0.18.1)
.claude/skills/research-agent/SKILL.md 41-41: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 48-48: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences)
.claude/skills/nia-docs/SKILL.md 19-19: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 20-20: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 25-25: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 26-26: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 31-31: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 32-32: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences)
.claude/skills/morph-search/SKILL.md 25-25: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 26-26: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 31-31: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 32-32: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences)
.claude/skills/perplexity-search/SKILL.md 35-35: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 36-36: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 43-43: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 44-44: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 49-49: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 50-50: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences) --- 55-55: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines Expected: 1; Actual: 0; Below (MD022, blanks-around-headings) --- 56-56: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines (MD031, blanks-around-fences)
üîá Additional comments (11)
.claude/skills/system_overview/SKILL.md (2)
`74-74`: **LGTM! Path correctly updated.** The Store learning script path has been correctly updated to reflect its new location in the `core/` subdirectory. --- `24-24`: The documentation paths are correct. The `recall_temporal_facts.py` script exists at `opc/scripts/recall_temporal_facts.py` and does not require updating. While other recall-related utilities (`recall_learnings.py`, `store_learning.py`) have been moved to `opc/scripts/core/`, the temporal facts script remains in the root scripts directory.
.claude/skills/help/SKILL.md (1)
`168-168`: **LGTM! Path update is consistent.** The script path update is correct and consistent with the same change in `.claude/skills/recall/SKILL.md`. The command syntax using a subshell is valid and achieves the same result as the approach used in the recall skill.
.claude/skills/recall-reasoning/SKILL.md (1)
`35-35`: **Path is correct‚Äîno changes needed.** The script `search-reasoning.sh` exists at `.claude/scripts/` and remains valid. Since this is a bash script (not Python), it was intentionally left in its original location while Python scripts were moved to `mcp/` and `core/` subdirectories.
.claude/skills/nia-docs/SKILL.md (1)
`15-15`: **Script path is incorrect ‚Äî referenced location does not exist.** The script exists at `opc/scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py`, not `scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py`. All seven command examples in SKILL.md reference the incorrect path and will fail when executed. Update all seven examples (lines 15, 21, 27, 33, 52, 56, 60) to reference `opc/scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py` instead. > Likely an incorrect or invalid review comment.
.claude/skills/perplexity-search/SKILL.md (1)
`31-105`: **LGTM! All perplexity_search.py references correctly updated.** All nine occurrences of the script path have been consistently updated from `scripts/perplexity_search.py` to `scripts/mcp/perplexity_search.py` across all usage modes (ask, search, research, reason, deep) and examples.
.claude/skills/research-external/SKILL.md (4)
`167-176`: **LGTM! Library focus paths correctly updated.** Both `nia_docs.py` script references in the library focus section have been properly updated to `scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py`. --- `179-181`: **LGTM! Firecrawl path correctly updated.** The `firecrawl_scrape.py` script path has been properly updated to `scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py`. --- `195-216`: **LGTM! Best-practices focus paths correctly updated.** All five `perplexity_search.py` script references in the best-practices section (both normal and thorough depth) have been consistently updated to `scripts/mcp/perplexity_search.py`. --- `225-240`: **LGTM! General focus paths correctly updated.** All three MCP tool script paths in the general focus section have been properly updated: - `nia_docs.py` ‚Üí `scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py` - `perplexity_search.py` ‚Üí `scripts/mcp/perplexity_search.py` - `firecrawl_scrape.py` ‚Üí `scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py`
.claude/skills/research-agent/SKILL.md (1)
`35-51`: **Script paths reference non-existent directory; verification fails.** The documented paths (`scripts/mcp/nia_docs.py`, `scripts/mcp/perplexity_search.py`, `scripts/mcp/firecrawl_scrape.py`) reference a `scripts/mcp/` directory that does not exist at the repository root. Actual script locations are `.claude/servers/` (firecrawl and perplexity) and `opc/scripts/mcp/` (nia_docs, perplexity_search, firecrawl_scrape). Update SKILL.md with the correct paths or verify the intended script organization. > Likely an incorrect or invalid review comment.
